title: Natural Science Multi-Vitamin Supplement for Pets | Oxbow
description: Support your pet's vitamin needs with Oxbow Natural Science Multi-Vitamin. A high-fiber supplement that supports your pet's body systems. Explore.
cleaned_text: [ ](https://oxbowanimalhealth.com/product/natural-science-papaya-support/) Natural Science Multi-Vitamin - Rabbits - Guinea Pigs - Gerbils and Hamsters - Rats and Mice - Chinchillas High fiber, daily support for your best friend! Natural Science Multi-Vitamin is a hay-based, high-fiber supplement containing essential vitamins to support all of your pet's body systems. It is also a beneficial source of essential Omega 3 and 6 fatty acids. Details - Ideal for: multi-pet households, picky pellet eaters, older animals, and pets suffering from environmental stressors or underlying health conditions - Highly palatable for small pets - Formulated with stable, high-quality vitamins - High fiber Timothy hay supports a healthy digestive system - Formulated with the guidance of leading veterinarians and nutritionists - No artificial flavors, colors, or preservatives Offer Effective, Targeted Support Every pet is unique, and some require a little extra support to be at their best. Our all natural, vet-formulated supplements make it easy to provide daily support where your pets need it most. From urinary and digestive care, to skin, coat and joint health, our high-quality Timothy hay-based supplements have the power to support their lifelong wellbeing. Timothy Grass, Barley Flour, Oat Groat Flour, Cane Molasses, Flax Seed Meal, Choline Chloride, Brewers Dried Yeast, L-Ascorbyl-2-Monophosphate (Vitamin C), Guar Gum, Vitamin E Supplement, Rice Hulls, Fat Product, Mixed (preservative), Calcium Carbonate, Niacin, A Riboflavin Supplement, Vitamin B12 Supplement, Mineral Oil, Pyridoxine Hydrochloride, Vitamin D3 Supplement, Folic Acid, Thiamine Mononitrate, Crude 20 Vitamin E (min): 1 IU: Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C)(min): 5 mg Omega 3 Fatty Acids (min): 1.20% Omega 6 Fatty Acids (min): 1.40% When changing your pet's daily regimen, consult your veterinarian. Rabbits, Guinea Pigs, and Chinchillas: 0-1 lb: 1/2 tab per day 1-4 lb: 1 tab per day 4 lb & over: 2 tabs per day Rats (all weights): 1/4 tab per day Other Species: Contact Oxbow or consult your veterinarian [help center](https://oxbowanimalhealth.powerappsportals.com/). Want to know what's in our products? Explore our ingredient glossary to learn more about what's in our products and why! Related Products THE MORE YOU KNOW, THE BETTER THEY'LL BE With the help and knowledge of our resident veterinary professionals, nutritionists and passionate, knowledgeable pet experts, we take pride in providing valuable content to help you create the best life possible for your pet.
